statements.statement: I know where to get reliable cybersecurity advice
I think the UK government provides helpful cybersecurity advice to parents
I can act upon the cybersecurity advice I am given by the UK government
My child's teacher is well informed about cybersecurity
Cybersecurity academics are aware of the latest cybersecurity precautions
I would be happy to accept cybersecurity advice from family support workers/family liaison officers
The UK government provides helpful cybersecurity advice
I would be happy to accept cybersecurity advice from cybersecurity academics
When I receive cybersecurity advice from my child's school, I act on it
I feel confident in educating my child(ren) about cybersecurity precautions and good practice
I am uncertain about different cybersecurity practices
I am happy with how technology providers currently assure my child's cybersecurity
I think technology providers could be doing more to provide better cyber security controls for children
The UK government needs to enforce higher cybersecurity standards from technology providers
The UK government should not meddle with the way technology providers deal assure cybersecurity
There are plenty of cybersecurity resources for parents, schools do not need to get involved
I would blame myself if my child's cybersecurity was compromised
I think children need to take responsibility for their online cyber security actions
I am not an expert, it is up to my child's educators to teach them about cybersecurity.
The UK government should take ultimate responsibility for protecting my child's cybersecurity
Hackers are not targeting children online so they don’t need to learn about cybersecurity until they are adults
Parents should figure out how to teach their children about cybersecurity without help from anyone else
I am confident in my ability to teach my children about cybersecurity
I do not have confidence in the UK government’s ability to help me teach my child about cybersecurity
Parents should be responsible for teaching their children about cybersecurity
